creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
medium: Fabric and paper collage with ink on cardboard
text: An abstract collage composed of dozens of torn and cut papers and fabrics across a horizontal format. In several places black in is used to accent the composition in a combination of splattered marks, lines and smudges. The paper and fabric color ranges from sandy brown to cream, orange and gray-blue.
title: Untitled (No. 708)
